emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_map

Class DocumentTreeMapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • prefuse.Display
            • emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_map.DocumentTreeMapView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class DocumentTreeMapView
extends prefuse.Display
    Responsibility of class is to represent collection of documents as a treemap responsive to the controller. note: code adopted from the Prefuse TreeMap demo at: http://prefuse.org/gallery/treemap/TreeMap.java
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
